GCKK3AU.original: ~z~We're both adults, Kiki. Why don't you ask me into your place?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~大家都是成年人，Kiki。要么让我进去坐坐吧？

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_LEAVE_FASTFOOD
~z~Let's go, Kiki.
~z~That is hilarious.
~z~Your language is so beautiful, Niko. It's such a shame you've got to speak English the whole time.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你的语言真美，Niko。可惜在这儿你只能说英语。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Well, have fun in there.
GCKK_ACT_END_BAD
~z~I'll be thinking about you... a lot.
~z~Goodbye, Kiki.
~z~This is going to be amazing. I might cry with happiness.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~那真是太棒了。我都快感动哭了。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~You know, you're probably right. I'll see you soon.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你可能是对的吧。我们之后见。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Niko, you really dominated me on that dart board. I loved it!
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~Niko，你在飞镖上征服了我。我喜欢！

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I hear they've got bowling alleys at American Air Force bases overseas. Is that where you learnt how to do it?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~听说美国空军的海外基地里有保龄球馆。你是在那学的吗？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Do you ever get so happy that you feel like crying, Niko? That what I'm feeling right now.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你有没有喜极而泣的经历，Niko？这就是我现在的感觉。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_DATEFINISHED_AGAIN
~z~Later on.
~z~Shit, add insult to fucking injury, Niko. Sorry, I'm not one of your cheap whores, okay?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~靠，真他妈是伤口上撒盐，Niko。对不起啊，我不是你的那些贱婊子，懂？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I really didn't think there was any way I wouldn't enjoy being taken out. But this wasn't fun. Goodbye.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我一直觉得出去玩肯定很有意思，但这次真的好无聊。再见。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Ummm.
GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_KISS
~z~Were you ashamed to be bowling with me, Niko? That's why you stopped, wasn't it?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~和我打保龄球让你感到羞耻吗，Niko？这就是你不打的理由，是吗？

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_BORED_GETTING
~z~I'm not going to get played by you, Niko. I'm not stupid.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我不会被你玩弄的，Niko。我不是傻子。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Congratulations, Niko. Good game.
~z~Ha ha ha ha.
~z~Enjoy yourself.
~z~Don't leave me out here in the cold, Kiki. Invite me in.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~别把我一人抛在这冷风中，Kiki。邀我上去吧。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_DATEFINISHED_GOOD
~z~Okay.
GCKK_ACT_BOWL_LEAVE_LOST
~z~Alright, I get it.
GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_REJECT_RESPONSE
~z~Oh my God.
~z~Niko, are you trying to fatten me up? I like this place but I can't eat here again.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~Niko，你是想把我喂肥吗？我喜欢这家店，但也不能回回来这儿啊。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Niko, I wish this date could go on forever, but it's got to end, doesn't it?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~Niko，我也想这场约会能一直持续下去，但天下没有不散的筵席。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_YES
~z~Call me, okay? Call me soon.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~给我打电话，好吗？再给我打电话。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~How about I keep you company inside?
~z~You are an amazing man, Niko.
~z~This is really going to mean something, Niko. Come in.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~这真的会很有意义的，Niko。进来吧。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~That is too much.
~z~Kiki, I don't want to have to say goodbye to you out here. How about I come in?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~Kiki，我不想和你就此道别。让我进去如何？

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_SHOW_RESPONSE_NEG
GCKK_ACT_END_GOOD
~z~I'm starting to get suspicious, Niko. Why haven't we gotten there yet?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我有点怀疑了，Niko。怎么还没到地方啊？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~See you, sweetie.
~z~Fine. You'll call me, right?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~好的，你会给我打电话的，对吧？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Alright then.
~z~Can't you even finish bowling with me? Are you that keen to get off with some other whore?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你连陪我打完一场都不肯？这么着急去和你的哪个婊子上床啊？

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_LEAVE_WALK
~z~Fuck me. I'm buzzed. Man, those cocktails have got a kick.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我操。我晕了。真的，这鸡尾酒有点东西。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~You really didn't have to spend that money, Niko. I'm not impressed by conspicuous consumption.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你真的不用花那钱，Niko。我不喜欢花钱买虚荣。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Another time then, Kiki? I'll call you.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~那就下次了，Kiki？我会打电话给你的。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Sorry for beating you, Niko. I couldn't help it.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~赢了你真是不好意思，Niko。爱莫能助。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~This has been so much fun. But I'm kinda worn out though.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~今天玩得真开心，但我有点累了。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~How about we find something else to do now?
~z~So long.
GCKK_ACT_LEAVE_STANDARD
~z~Okay then.
GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_GOOD_Y
~z~You are so misunderstood, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_BOWL_LEAVE_DRAW
~z~Niko, if you've got a problem with a dominant female who can beat you at pool, then maybe you're dating the wrong girl.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~Niko，如果你不喜欢能在台球上赢过你的女强人，那你可能约错妹子了。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Will you take me home?
~z~Yeah, give me all the STDs you've caught off those other cheap whores. Shame on you, Niko.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~对，把你从那些婊子身上得到的性病都传染给我。真可耻啊，Niko。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_LEAVE_SHOW_COMEDY
~z~Stop it!
~z~My ex-boyfriend used to take me here before he got sentenced.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我前男友被判刑前经常带我来这儿。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~That was really nice, Niko. I feel like I'm really getting to know you.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你人还挺不错的，Niko。我觉得我有点了解你了。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Whoa. Those drinks were strong weren't they?
~z~I don't often lose, Niko.
~z~Bye, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_DIFF_FASTFOOD_NO
~z~I don't want to go home yet. Is there something else you'd like to do now?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我还不想回家呢。你还想玩点别的吗？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Niko, are you taking me somewhere or what?
~z~Niko, I can't eat here now. There are too many painful memories of Tremaine.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~Niko，在这我吃不下饭。在这我就想起了Tremaine，痛苦的回忆。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_LEAVE_HIGHEND
GCKK_ACT_LEAVE_PUB_GENERIC
~z~Hey, I thought you were taking me home.
~z~Alright then.
~z~I enjoyed that, Niko. You're a good conversationalist.
GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_GOOD_N
~z~Niko, I feel like we were destined to meet each other.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~Niko，我感觉我们的相遇是命中注定。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Jesus, Niko. This was hardly even a date.
~z~Can you take me back to my place?
GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_BONK
GCKK_ACT_BOWL_LEAVE_ABANDON
~z~You're so clever with that pool cue, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_POOL_LEAVE_DRAW
~z~I thought you were taking me home, Niko.
~z~I really felt like we got close on this date. It can't go on forever though.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~感觉我们这次真的亲近了不少，但约会总是要结束的。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~It's hard to say goodbye but we have to.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~分别虽然痛苦，但这是必须的。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Umm, you're going to call me aren't you?
~z~Bring me home, will you?
~z~That was so nice, Niko. I don't care what they say about health risks, that stuff tastes good.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~真的很不错，Niko。不管他们说这东西对健康多有害，我就是觉得真香。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I'd like it if you dropped me back at my place.
GCKK_ACT_LEAVE_PUB_FAVOURITE
GCKK_ACT_DATEFINISHED_OK
~z~I feel like you're stalling, Niko. Why is taking so long to get there?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我感觉你磨磨蹭蹭的，Niko。为什么这么久才到？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I don't understand why we stopped. Have you got sick of me?
~z~What's the chances of finishing on a tie? I guess we're perfectly matched, aren't we?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~平局结束的概率真的好小，我们大概是命中注定的一对吧，不是吗？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Oh well, this has been fun.
~z~Man, oh man. I think I should have stopped drinking three beers ago.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~天，我天。我就不该喝最后三杯酒的。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Can you bring me home?
GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_KISS_RESPONSE
~z~Drop me home please.
~z~I'd like to come in with you, Kiki.
GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_REJECT
GCKK_ACT_DARTS_LEAVE_ABANDON
~z~This has been swell, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_POOL_LEAVE_ABANDON
~z~There's nothing I want more than to be both physically and emotionally close to you. Not tonight though.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我也想在精神和肉体两方面跟你亲近，但不是今晚。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~How about you take me somewhere else now? That's if you're not tired of me yet.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~带我去其他地方怎么样？如果你还不烦我的话。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I hope you're not intimidated by my beating you, Niko.
~z~Enjoy the memories then. Goodbye.
~z~You're really good at bowling, Niko.
~z~That was so nice, you don't have to spend money for me to have a good time.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~真不错，不用你破费也能让我玩得开心。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~See you really soon, Niko.
~z~I need it to really mean something when we're together physically. Not tonight, Niko.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我们在一起的那一晚应该要更有意义。今晚不行，Niko。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~It'd be nice if you took me home now.
GCKK_ACT_BORED_HOME
~z~I feel like I really understand you now, Niko.
~z~I thought you were taking me somewhere.
~z~Goodbye then.
GCKK_ACT_SHOW_RESPONSE_POS
~z~That man was very amusing.
~z~I'd like a lift home, if that's okay?
~z~This date has been amazing. We're really breaking down barriers. Maybe we should call it a day though.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~这次约会真的太棒了，我们之间的隔阂一定变少了。不过今天就到这吧。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_NO_RESPONSE
~z~Why are we leaving? Do you have to get back to some cheap whore or something?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~怎么就走了？你是急着去找哪个贱婊还是怎样？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Niko, I'm scared of getting close to you. I can't invite you in.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~Niko，我现在还是有点怕你。我不能请你进来。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Niko, I'm taking time out from work to be here. Can we do something?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~Niko，我是百忙之中抽空出来的，你能快点吗？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Why don't we do something else now?
~z~Wow! Who'd have thought I was so good at bowling?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~哇！没想到我保龄球打得这么好！

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I bet you finish the games you start with your other whores.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你跟别的婊子一起时肯定能做到有始有终。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I guess there isn't a winner then.
~z~I've had a nice time, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_DARTS_LEAVE__LOST
GCKK_ACT_POOL_LEAVE_WON
~z~Why are we stopping? Have you got to run to some cheap whore?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~怎么不玩了？你急着去找你的贱婊吗？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Did you take me out just to humiliate me, Niko? Show me some respect.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你带我出来就是为了羞辱我吗，Niko？给我点尊重好不好。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Whatever you say, Kiki.
~z~I don't like a man who won't finish what he's started, Niko.
~z~I've got to compete with men as part of my career, it's no real surprise I beat you.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~与男人竞争也是我工作的一部分，赢了你不奇怪。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_DARTS_LEAVE_DRAW
~z~That really taught me a lot about your culture, Niko. Thank you for sharing it with me.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~这场演出让我更好地了解了你的文化，Niko。谢谢你带我来这儿。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_LEAVE_SHOW_CABARET
~z~Hey, now that I've brought you back here, are you going to invite me in?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~嘿，我都送你回来了，你不请我进去坐会儿吗？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~It was a bit degrading but funny all the same.
~z~Come on, Niko. It can't be that hard to get me home. Why is it taking so long?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~搞错没有，Niko，送我回家很难吗？为什么要这么久？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Ummm, Niko, it sure is taking a long time to get me home, isn't it?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~唔，Niko，送我回家用的时间好像有点长了吧？

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Let's go inside.
~z~Niko, you're sweet.
GCKK_ACT_BOWL_LEAVE_WON
GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_NO
~z~Sure, Kiki, sure.
GCKK_ACT_END_BAD_RESP
~z~What sort of girl do you think I am, Niko?
~z~Well you're being sensible for both of us. Thank you. I'll call you, Kiki.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你这样对大家都好。谢谢。我会给你打电话的，Kiki。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_DATEFINISHED_HOME
GCKK_ACT_POOL_LEAVE_LOST
~z~There's nothing like sharing a moment like this with someone you care about, is there?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~没有什么比和你在乎的人共享这样的时刻更好的了，不是吗?

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~It would mean a lot to me if I could come inside, Kiki.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~要是你能请我进门就再好不过了，Kiki。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~Whoa. I thought you were going to keep an eye on my drinking, Niko.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~哇啊。我还以为你会让我少喝两杯呢，Niko。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I'm gonna remember this moment for ever. It's so special.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我将永远记住这一刻，如此特别的一刻。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I think it's time to put an end to this date.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我想是时候结束这场约会了。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_RESPONSE
~z~Can't stand sitting next to me, is that it? I can't believe you couldn't even wait until the end of the show.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~受不了坐我旁边了是吧？没想到你都不能等到演完再走。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I can tell your mind has been on your other cheap whores all night, Niko.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我知道你整晚都在想着你的那些贱婊，Niko。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~This date could keep going inside your place if you invite me in. How about it?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~如果你让我进去，我们还能接着约会。你觉得呢?

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~That place is full of bankers and lawyers. I'm not interested in guys like that. Don't turn into one of them.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~那家店尽是银行家和律师，我对那种家伙不感兴趣。别变成种人。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~So you think I'm cheap like your other whores! Thanks a lot, Niko.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~所以你觉得我和你的其他婊子一样贱！谢谢你啊，Niko。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I had a really good time, Niko. I can't tell you how nice it is to be taken out on a date.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我玩得很开心，Niko。和你出去约会真是无法形容的好。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_LEAVE_CLUB_GENERIC
GCKK_ACT_DARTS_LEAVE_WON
~z~I'm going home now.
~z~We're so perfectly matched, Niko.
GCKK_ACT_DATEFINISHED_BAD
~z~You'll be on my mind then, Kiki. I'll see you soon.
~z~My time is really valuable, Niko. Can we do something soon?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~我的时间非常宝贵，Niko。我们能快点做些什么吗？

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_LEAVE_SHOW_EARLY
~z~Yeah. Okay.
~z~Well, maybe I'll take you out again, give me your number. I'll see you soon.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~也许我会再邀你出来，给我你的号码吧。那再见啦。

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~I'll see you round, Kiki.
~z~You shouldn't have let me drink so much. I'm feeling buzzed.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你不应该让我喝这么多。我头有点晕了。

GCKK3AU.original: GCKK_ACT_PKI_END_KISS_AGREE
~z~You really know how to handle those darts, Niko. I wonder what else you're good at?
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~你真的好会玩飞镖，Niko。我在想你还擅长些什么呢?

GCKK3AU.original: ~z~It's been so hard resisting you. I'm so pleased that it's time.
GCKK3AU.translated: ~z~拒绝你真的很难。我不用再拒绝你真是太开心了。
